meanings.sent1: The magician wowed the audience with his amazing tricks.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display wowed everyone at the park.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wowed us by learning a new trick in just one day.
meanings.sent4: The singer wowed the judges with her powerful voice.
meanings.sent5: The grand finale of the show wowed the crowd with its spectacular display of lights and music.

meanings.definition: To cause someone to feel great admiration or astonishment.
meanings.sent1: The artist's masterpiece wowed the art critics.
meanings.sent2: The surprise party wowed Sarah on her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The clever plot twist in the movie wowed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The view from the mountaintop wowed us with its breathtaking beauty.
meanings.sent5: The acrobat's daring performance wowed the spectators at the circus.
